settings.title: About Us
settings.text:
JOJO's was created by Momma Jojo, who after being diagnosed with breast cancer needed to get her health back. She started by trying to control her sugar cravings. This is when JOJO's Chocolate Bark was born! Try JOJO's today to kick your sugar craving!

contact@jojoschocolate.com

+1 805-395-6567

settings.section-heading: YOUR DAILY BITE OF DARK CHOCOLATE
settings.description: Satisfy your cravings with JOJO's delicious dark chocolate that has 8g of sugar or less

settings.title: Where snack and treat, meet!
settings.text: We found the sweet spot: a new way to snack that doesn’t come with compromises. Go ahead, indulge in JoJo’s whenever you feel like it. It’s a better-for-you alternative that bridges the divide between treat and snack. Guilt-free.

settings.title: Made from love.
settings.text: My mom “JOJO” has always been an inspiration to me. She was radiantly positive and happy no matter what challenges came her way, so when diagnosed with breast cancer she faced it head on with a smile.

settings.title: #kickthecraving
settings.text: We’re the only chocolate company that wants you to eat less, not more! A daily dose of JOJO’s deliciousness will help you kick your sugar cravings. We added slow-digesting plant-based protein-containing dietary fiber to help regulate blood glucose, reduce energy crashes and sugar cravings!

settings.heading: Everything you want, nothing you don’t.

settings.title: On a mission to be your daily, guilt-free indulgence.
settings.text: JOJO's is an everyday dose of deliciousness that doesn't force you to choose between a healthy snack and a sweet treat.

settings.quote: I embarked on a low sugar diet, which has now become a lifestyle choice, when I encountered Jojo’s, quite by accident. I have since lost 10 lbs and I enjoy one with a cup of tea, nightly. I look forward to it being my treat for a day if healthy eating. I don’t know what I’d ever do without them.
settings.author: ANNE W.

settings.quote: This chocolate was hands down the best chocolate I have EVER had. It was rich. It was creamy. It was filling. It was satisfying. Every single bite was amazing and so fulfilling. So worth every single penny. I kid you not :)
settings.author: SUE

settings.quote: This is an awesome product...This chocolate bark stops cravings for sweets and does not irritate my system in any way. Just a small piece is satisfying. This is my second order I'm a very satisfied customer.
settings.author: HISSONGBIRD

settings.quote: I have tried both flavors and they are equally amazing! As a weight loss surgery patient I am always looking for smarter choices when it comes to sweets. These have exceeded my expectations. I will continue to repurchase these because they are so delicious.
settings.author: ELIZABETH W

settings.quote: This bark is so much better than anything you will find in the specialty grocery stores- I've tried them all! This product is always fresh and delivered on time, and the customer service is second to none. Try JoJo's! You'll love it!
settings.author: HOLLY

settings.quote: I love this chocolate so much! The peanut butter and chocolate combination is so delicious and the peanuts on top just make it even better. My kids even love it. And I feel good about them eating it because of how healthy it is too! JoJos is my favorite for a healthy and delicious snack.
settings.author: NATALIE

settings.title: Hide from your husband & kids kind of good.

settings.text:
My mom “Jojo” has always been an inspiration to me. She was radiantly positive and happy no matter what challenges came her way, so when diagnosed with breast cancer she faced it head-on with a smile.

Dedicated to living as healthy as possible, she went to work in the kitchen perfecting a delicious, low-sugar, guilt-free chocolate snack that satisfied her sugar cravings.

Jojo’s sweet mission lives on to this day, and I’m proud to share her wonderful creation with you that’s as delightful as she was!

With love & chocolate,
-her favorite son, Sterling

settings.title: The sweet spot.
settings.text: JOJO’s Chocolate is your everyday dose of deliciousness that doesn’t force you to choose between a healthy snack and a sweet treat. JOJO’s is on a mission to help America consume less sugar and to challenge the way people view chocolate. You CAN eat your chocolate DAILY and not feel guilty about it. Because life is happier with chocolate.

settings.title: Honest Ingredients with a purpose.
settings.text: We’re clear about what our ingredients are, how we select them, and why they’re so good for you. With premium dark chocolate, high-quality protein, low or no-sugar, we’re giving chocolate lovers a delicious treat, and a healthier way to snack without tradeoffs. Every JOJO’s Chocolate bar is topped with real ingredients that pack nutrients into every bite without all the sugar.

After her cancer diagnosis, Jojo wanted to live healthier, but she craved sweets, more specifically, chocolate. Her options were limited, buy from the candy aisle and feel guilty, or deprive herself of chocolate, which either left her unsatisfied or would lead to binging later on! We believe you shouldn’t feel guilty for enjoying the food you love (and that includes chocolate). We don’t believe in depriving ourselves. We do believe focusing on what we can have empowers us to make healthier choices! Yes, JOJO’s is low-sugar, low-carb, simple & clean ingredients, NON-GMO, Gluten-Free, Lactose-Free, and Soy-Free. But more importantly, it’s DELICIOUS dark chocolate that will help you satisfy your daily sugar cravings.

Antioxidants are the compounds that are believed to neutralize free radicals and protect the body from their damage.  Dark chocolate lessens cravings for sweet, salty, and fatty foods.  "Numerous studies show dark chocolate increases blood flow to the heart" German study
A study published in 2015 found that not only did dark chocolate lower the blood pressure of the hypertensive diabetics, but it also decreased fasting blood sugar. (1)

One of our favorite benefits of dark chocolate is its free radical fighting ability. Antioxidants are the compounds that are believed to neutralize free radicals and protect the body from their damage.

settings.description: Yes. There is no added dairy. However, it is manufactured in a facility that makes products that contain dairy.
Yes. All of the ingredients are vegan including the protein. We are in the process of obtaining a Vegan certification to include on our new bags.
Our products are not kosher certified however our manufacturing facility is and all of our ingredients are kosher but our actual finished product is not certified.

Why, yes it is! We changed from Soy to Sunflower Lecithin because our goal is to help everyone become healthier-that's why we love JOJO's so much - it satisfies so much quicker so that you don't have those cravings that chocolate loaded with sugar wants you to have!

We now have two KETO bars: Goes Hawaiian & Raspberry Dream. They are made with the same protein as the Original and Peanut Butter and are sweetened with Erythritol, so there is no sugar. Our other bars, Original & Peanut Butter Delight are not KETO friendly.

Yes, all of our bars are diabetic friendly. Our new flavors, Raspberry Dream and Goes Hawaiian, are sugar free - sweetened with an Erythritol/Stevia blend. Please follow the advice of your healthcare provider though.

settings.sub_category: How many Weight Watchers Points does JOJO's have?
settings.description:
Original: 8 points per serving

Peanut Butter Delight: 8 points per serving

Raspberry Dream: 6 points per serving

Goes Hawaiian: 7 points per serving
It is a plant based HEMP protein, which is one of the easier and slower digesting proteins made.

The chocolate used for JOJO’s is imported from Germany and the cocoa is sourced from Ecuador.

cocoa is sourced from Ecuador.

Protein - Sourced in Canada

Peanuts - Sourced in Canada

Cranberries - Sourced in Canada

Raspberries - Sourced in United States

Pistachios - Sourced in United States

Coconut - Philippines

Macadamia Nuts - Processed in Canada

Almonds - Processed in Canada

Sea Salt - USA
It is a Utah based company, manufactured in Canada.
JOJO’s Goes Hawaiian and JOJO’s Raspberry Dream, contain an Erythritol/Stevia blend. JOJO’s Original and JOJO’s Peanut Butter Delight are sweetened with Non GMO beet sugar.
No.
The new Raspberry Dream and Goes Hawaiian are sweetened with an Erythritol/Stevia blend. The Original and Peanut Butter Delight bars are sweetened with Non GMO beet sugar.

settings.sub_category: Are the nuts used in JOJO’s raw?
settings.description: The nuts used in JOJO’s are dry roasted.

settings.sub_category: Will the hemp protein affect drug testing?
settings.description: You would have to eat hundreds of them in a 24 hour period to affect drug testing. Which is a great thing for us, but your tummy might not like it.

settings.sub_category: How much caffeine is in a bar of JOJO’s?
settings.description: All chocolate contains caffeine naturally but JOJO’s does not add any additional caffeine to its product. For 1 bar (1.2 oz.) of our Original or Peanut Butter Delight flavors, there is about 25.5 mg of natural caffeine. For 1 bar (1.2 oz.) of our Goes Hawaiian or Raspberry Dream flavors, there is about 20 mg of natural caffeine.
Depending on where you live. It is a Utah based company, with the home office in Sandy.
Yes. Our chocolate is a 70% dark chocolate imported from Germany. It is sourced from Ecuador and we have been assured that it is fair trade.
No.

settings.sub_category: How many ounces are in one bar of JOJO’s?
settings.description: It is a 1.2 oz bar

settings.sub_category: My product came in white, with a weird film on it. What does that mean?
settings.description: That means that it has started blooming. Please email contact@jojoschocolate.com so we can send you a fresh bag.

settings.sub_category: Where can I buy JOJO’s near me?
settings.description: JOJO’s is growing and popping up in new retail locations throughout the US. The best way to find out if JOJO’s is in a retailer near you is to use our location search function on our website. Just enter your zip code and you can see if there is a retailer close by HERE.

settings.sub_category: Why is JOJO’s so much cheaper at Costco?
settings.description: There are a couple of reasons why Costco has a cheaper price. The simplest reason is Costco has a membership, bulk price item (the 14 bar Original bag) that is only sold at Costco. All other retail locations have 7 bar bags and carry other flavors (Peanut Butter Delight, Goes Hawaiian, and Raspberry Dream). Costco only carries our original flavor.

settings.sub_category: How do I cancel my subscription?
settings.description: We can cancel that for you if you would like, please email contact@jojoschocolate.com or you can cancel it on our website by logging in to your account. We would love your feedback on why you are canceling and if there were any issues with our chocolate.
We don’t currently offer free samples online.

settings.sub_category: How does JOJO’s pack their chocolate to prevent it from melting?
settings.description: In summer months, we use styrofoam to keep the box insulated and a few ice packs in each box to prevent chocolate from melting. Please contact us if you ever receive chocolate that melted during transit.

settings.sub_category: Should I keep JOJO’s in my refrigerator?
settings.description: You do not have to keep JOJO’s refrigerated, but it will last longer if you keep it cool. Try it frozen! Yummy!
